projects.title: Invoice App
projects.body: CRUD app for efficient invoice document management with clean and solid design.

projects.title: Book Library
projects.body: App meant to help keep track of book collection thanks to the implemented various filter functions.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.body: The application uses API provided by weatherapi.com set up with Node.js and JavaScript. Displays current weather, temperature and time based on the chosen city.

projects.title: Homey Goat
projects.body: Responsive website design for a miniature painting studio.  Built with HTML, CSS and JavaScript accordingly to the Mobile-First implementation rule.
